title: General Cleaner
content:
The General Cleaner for the Jackie Robinson Training Complex (JRTC) is responsible for the cleaning of all JRTC-related buildings, facilities and equipment (primarily interior, occasionally exterior).
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Clean floors:

 Dry mop, wet mop, sweep, and disinfect.
Vacuum and spot clean carpeting and rugs.


Clean furnishings and fixtures including but not limited to dusting, spot cleaning or washing, disinfecting, and polishing. Clean ledges, shelves, vents, etc.
Straighten furniture and inspect for wear and defects.
Empty, clean and reline waste baskets. Empty and clean ash trays.
Clean bathrooms:

Clean and disinfect all fixtures, floors and walls.
Wash windows and mirrors.
Replenish bathroom supplies.


Clean walls, windows, doors and ceilings:

Wash and disinfect, and spot clean between washings.
Clean ceiling fixtures and wall hangings.


Clean stairways, entrances and exits.
Clean all employee work areas including offices, break rooms, bathrooms and meeting rooms.
Stock and maintain housekeeping supply rooms and carts.
Ensure a high level of customer service is performed at all times.
Assist guests with request and questions as necessary.
Report any damages or repairs needed to management.
Report any maintenance or safety hazards.
Report all lost and found items to the Manager, Housekeeping.
Assist with housekeeping (hotel room cleaning) and laundry duties as needed.
Other duties as assigned by the Manager, Housekeeping.

REQUIREMENTS:

One (1) year of housekeeping experience strongly preferred but not required.
One (1) year of general cleaning experience preferred by not required.
Physical stamina and mobility including ability to reach, kneel and bend.
Ability to lift, push and pull required load (usually about 30 lbs.).
Ability to communicate effectively with guests, co-workers and managers.
Ability to work irregular hours, including nights, weekends and holidays as needed.
